text: Eve's Plum was an American rock band. The band existed from 1991 to 1998. == Members == * Colleen Fitzpatrick (vocals) * Michael Kotch (guitar) * Theo Mack (bass, 1994) * Chris Giammalvo (bass, 1992-1994) * Ben Kotch (drums) == Discography == * Envy (1993) * Cherry Alive (1995) Category:American rock bands Category:American punk bands Category:Grunge bands Category:Musical groups established in 1991 Category:1991 establishments in New York (state) Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1998 Category:1998 disestablishments in the United States Category:1990s American music groups Category:Musical groups from New York (state) Category:1990s disestablishments in New York (state)
title: Eve's Plum
